title: Linux netcat (nc) Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the versatile Linux netcat (nc) command and learn how to use it for server-client communication, file transfers, and other practical networking tasks.

meta.keywords: netcat, nc, Linux, networking, communication, file transfer, server, client
